short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realnote is a single sheet note taking application that helps you to take notes on go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Realnote is your pocket-sized best friend that aims to make writing on the go fun and sharing it fast & easy. It's a single sheet of text with your progress automatically saved and restored between sessions â€” no file management to worry about here.

Realnote doesn't want (or need) to replace your text editor, to-do app etc. With its original blend of utility & versatility, Realnote is the ideal springboard for all your writing on the go: drafts, notes, lists, ideas, thoughts etc. It's a pleasure to write in Realnote, and effortless to move the writing out. The extension contains both a light and dark theme.

New Features:
- Now Realnote supports chrome side panel. (To use side panel click on the "Show side panel" button on top-right coroner next to pinned chrome extensions and click on dropdown and select Realnote.)

The Features:
- Download notes into a text file.
- Take screenshot for the notes.
- Copy all text with one click.
- Open an exiting text to view or edit and save.
- Go Fullscreen to write and have more area to write. 
- You can use in light and dark theme.

How can I support the extension's development?
Thanks for asking! You can by:
